document.full_text: north and south sudan have agreed to withdraw all unauthorized forces from the contested abyei border region, the united nations said, in an attempt to defuse tensions in the oil-producing flashpoint.
document.title: north, south sudan to remove abyei forces: u.n.
lines_and_colors: north and south sudan have agreed to withdraw all unauthorized forces from the contested abyei border region, the united nations said, in an attempt to defuse tensions in the oil-producing flashpoint.
